properties.areaDesc: Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 3 at 1:40PM MST until February 4 at 9:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 with
locally higher snow amounts possible. Winds gusting around 35
mph at times. .

* WHERE...Southern Sangre de Cristo mountains.

* WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 9 PM MST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult with icy and snow packed
roads. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce
visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening
commute on Monday and morning commute on Tuesday. The cold
wind chills as low as 15 below zero could result in
hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 PM MST TUESDAY
